snippet: Turkey is steadily sealing its frontier with Syria, long infiltrated in both directions by fighters and smugglers, with fences, minefields, ditches and a wall that will snake even through the most mountainous regions....

headline.main: Walls, Drones and Mines: Turkey Tightens Border as Syria Incursion Deepens
headline.print_headline: Walls, Drones and Mines: Turkey Tightens Border as Syria Incursion Deepens

lead_paragraph: Turkey is steadily sealing its frontier with Syria, long infiltrated in both directions by fighters and smugglers, with fences, minefields, ditches and a wall that will snake even through the most mountainous regions.
